title: Chord Library for Musicians
original_prompt: Show the lyrics of "Imagine" by "John Lennon". At the beginning, add Interpret, Title, Length and Tuning for Guitar.  After Tuning, add a List of all chords used in the song followed by a representation of every chord, for example for the chord "C" the representation would be "x32100". in lyrics sheet, place chords in a seperate line above the lyrics just when the lyrics occur.
split_prompt:
This is a prompt description:```json
{
    "spliting prompt": {
        "Interpret": [
            "John Lennon"
        ],
        "Title": [
            "Imagine"
        ],
        "Length": [
            "placeholder"  // Length of the song can be added here
        ],
        "Tuning": [
            "Standard"  // Assuming standard tuning for guitar
        ],
        "Chords": [
            "C",
            "F",
            "G",
            "Am",
            "E"
        ],
        "Chord Representations": [
            "C: x32010",
            "F: 133211",
            "G: 320003",
            "Am: x02210",
            "E: 022100"
        ],
        "Lyrics": [
            "C",
            "Imagine there's no heaven",
            "F",
            "It's easy if you try",
            "G",
            "No hell below us",
            "C",
            "Above us only sky",
            "Am",
            "Imagine all the people",
            "E",
            "Living for today... Ahh...",
            // Continue with the rest of the lyrics in the same format
        ]
    }
}
```
input1: Interpret: John Lennon, Title: Imagine, Length: 3:01, Tuning: Standard EADGBE, Chords: C, Cmaj7, F, Am, Dm, E, G, A, Bm; C: x32010, Cmaj7: x32000, F: 133211, Am: x02210, Dm: xx0231, E: 022100, G: 320003, A: x02220, Bm: x24432
